com.stormpath.sdk.group

Interface CreateGroupRequest


  • public interface CreateGroupRequest
    Represents an attempt to create a new Group record in Stormpath.
    Since:
    0.9
    See Also:
    Application.createGroup(com.stormpath.sdk.group.CreateGroupRequest)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Group getGroup()
      Returns the Group instance for which a new record will be created in Stormpath.
      GroupOptions getGroupOptions()
      Returns the GroupOptions to be used in the CreateGroupRequest s to retrieve the group's references as part of Stormpath's response upon successful group creation.
      boolean isGroupOptionsSpecified()
      Returns true if the the request reflects that the CreateGroupRequest (POST) message will be send with URL query parameters to retrieve the group's references as part of Stormpath's response upon successful group creation.

    • Method Detail

      • getGroup

        Group getGroup()
        Returns the Group instance for which a new record will be created in Stormpath.
        Returns:
        the Group instance for which a new record will be created in Stormpath.

      • isGroupOptionsSpecified

        boolean isGroupOptionsSpecified()
        Returns true if the the request reflects that the CreateGroupRequest (POST) message will be send with URL query parameters to retrieve the group's references as part of Stormpath's response upon successful group creation.

        You should always invoke this method to see if it is safe to invoke the getGroupOptions() method.

        Returns:
        true if the the request reflects that the CreateGroupRequest (POST) message will be send with URL query parameters to retrieve the expanded references in the Stormpath's response upon successful group creation.

      • getGroupOptions

        GroupOptions getGroupOptions()
                             throws IllegalStateException
        Returns the GroupOptions to be used in the CreateGroupRequest s to retrieve the group's references as part of Stormpath's response upon successful group creation.

        Always call the isGroupOptionsSpecified() method first to see if this value has been configured. Attempting to call this method when it has not been configured will result in an IllegalStateException

        Returns:
        GroupOptions to be used in the CreateGroupRequest s to retrieve the group's references as part of Stormpath's response upon successful group creation.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if this method is called but isGroupOptionsSpecified() is false.
